name: Space Team III
description:
Created within 48 hours during the SAE Melbourne Game Jam 2019.

Player 1 uses WASD and space bar. Shoot the ships that are being launched by Player 2.

Player 2 uses arrow keys (left and right). Spawn an enemy ship every few seconds and try to destroy Player 1.

Credits
Josef Beyer-Rieger
Daniel Wilson
Madison Delmenico
Villy
David Tran
